categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: An Imperial major was put in charge of a medicinal spice mine on the Mid Rim planet Naboo during the Imperial Era. In 3 BBY, the human miner Brel Ti Vorne informed the Alderaanian Princess Leia Organa that the mining equipment she had gifted him and his colleagues would be sold by the major for personal profit. Outraged, Organa and Naboo's Queen Dalné visited Moff Quarsh Panaka in his chalet, informing the official of the major's crimes.
The Imperial major was mentioned in Leia, Princess of Alderaan, a 2017 young-adult novel written by Claudia Gray.
